Reviews.Title: “Good for the price!”
Reviews.Author: Lilian D
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ingles march 2011 overall spacious plasma tv basic amenities little updated hotel cleaned bed comfortable costumer service receptionist none rude wrong information twice attitude time dislike acted didnt care clients location perfect middle close puerta del sol tip coming airport train follow directions hotel walked 5 blocks rain wrong direction hotel wrong info

Reviews.Title: “Why are you trying to sleep? It's party time !!!”
Reviews.Author: Gorgonzillah
Reviews.Content: picked hotel ingles reading trip advisor reviews stay couple nights spending week costa del sol hotel bathroom assurance relatively sturdy walls consideration neighbors am world class snorer paying rate ritz pleasantly surprised received generous bedroom attached drawing overlooking street bathroom appointed queen sized bed firm location short walk downhill museums paseo el prado puerto del sol plaza mayor close business center nearby plaza check email print boarding passes else starbucks free internet purchase windows security blinds double doors bedroom drawing closed add reasonable protection street noise quiet regular weekday night party atmosphere developed centro neighborhood warm friday april friendly massive joined toured neighborhoods returned hotel relatively midnight flight day hold hotel responsible mens chorus chucking empty bottles metal bins 400 am street recommend hotels standard continental breakfast positive pleasure able pour warmup coffee able lower priced meal nearby cafe spend twice madrids equivalent bacon eggs hash browns server wouldnt giving coffee agree previous reviewer air conditioning weak bad april couldnt august

Reviews.Title: “Value for money”
Reviews.Author: Ddo63
Reviews.Content: location centre noisey night dispite 2 double bit shabby clean safe breakfast basic happy value 64 euros night double breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Avoid at all costs”

Reviews.Content: hotel ingles distinguished pedigree super location current incarnation nightmare absolutely hostile staff mystery persons write hotels emails communicate front desk bathrooms particular coated mold crumbling ceilings water damage showers spray horizontally tub onto opposing wall extremely rundown desperate makeover youre hostals plaza de las cortes

Reviews.Title: “A slightly jewel from the past”

Reviews.Content: hotel real gem decades ago stayed nights comfortable entire stay fantastic location nightlife 2 minutes walk office facilities busines probably wouldnt stay summer stay hotel ingles 7 8 months readily
